title: Firefix 93 No "Send Tab" Option, Unable to See Synced Tabs
content:
I've just set up Firefox Sync, but it is only working one way. I can see my computer's tabs from my phone but I cannot see my phone's tabs from the computer - if I use the quick access "Show tabs from other devices" it just spins a loading wheel with "Syncing".

Also, the "Send Tab" option when you right click a tab does not appear at all. Sending a tab from the phone to computer does not result in anything appearing on my computer.

Everything is set to sync on both devices, and I have tried to sync it manually. Both versions are up to date.
creator: jas57

title: Can't get into my account
content:
I'm trying to login to Firefox on my new computer but I keep hitting a wall. A long time ago (like years at this point) I used a previous email address. I've since changed the main email and the back up email to different ones. I'm trying to sign in and it sends an email to my main email. I get the email, use the code, but it jumps to "incorrect password" and displays the very, very old email as the account I'm attempting to login to.

I've tried clicking on "use a different account" but it just restarts the entire process. I also tried to add a recovery key but it just keeps saying "try again in 15 minutes" even though I tried about 5 hours apart. I don't know why my sync still thinks I'm using an old email address when I've had it changed for years. This has happened before but I was always able to somehow get in and sign in.

Is there some way I can fix this?
creator: globalmeg

title: After update to 93.0, can't open links unless I disable uBlock origin
content: After the most recent update to Firefox 93.0, I could not open any links at all. It was OK in troubleshooting mode, so I went through and disabled all of my add-ons one-by-one. Once I disabled uBlock Pro, links opened. But I need uBlock Pro! Is there a workaround or another option?
creator: john.m.sechini
